_id.description: Unique identifier of the inventory record

_cursor.description: Cursor for pagination in the API response

ReceiverId.description: Identifier of the receiver who accepted the inventory

ReceivedDate.description: Date when the inventory was received

ReceiveItemId.description: Identifier associated with the receiving of the inventory item

CustomerIdentifier.description: Identifier of the customer associated with the inventory

FacilityIdentifier.description: Identifier of the facility storing the inventory

Upc.description: Universal Product Code of the inventory item

InventoryUnitOfMeasureIdentifier.description: Identifier of the unit of measure used for inventory

SecondaryUnitOfMeasureIdentifier.description: Identifier of the secondary unit of measure used for inventory

InventoryUnitsPerSecondaryUnit.description: Number of inventory units per secondary unit

OnHandQty.description: Total quantity of inventory on hand

AvailableQty.description: Quantity of inventory available for sale or use

OnHoldQty.description: Quantity of inventory currently on hold

SecondaryReceivedQty.description: Quantity of inventory received in secondary units

SecondaryOnHandQty.description: Total quantity of inventory on hand in secondary units

SecondaryAvailableQty.description: Quantity of inventory available in secondary units

SecondaryOnHoldQty.description: Quantity of inventory currently on hold in secondary units

WeightImperial.description: Weight of the inventory item in imperial units

WeightImperialOnHand.description: Weight of inventory on hand in imperial units

WeightImperialAvailable.description: Weight of available inventory in imperial units

WeightMetric.description: Weight of the inventory item in metric units

WeightMetricOnHand.description: Weight of inventory on hand in metric units

WeightMetricAvailable.description: Weight of available inventory in metric units

SavedElements.description: Saved elements related to the inventory item

LotNumber.description: Lot number associated with the inventory item

SerialNumber.description: Serial number associated with the inventory item

ExpirationDate.description: Date when the inventory item expires

Cost.description: Cost per unit of the inventory item

SupplierIdentifier.description: Identifier of the supplier providing the inventory

LocationIdentifier.description: Identifier of the location within the facility where the inventory is stored

PalletIdentifier.description: Identifier of the pallet where the inventory is stored

OnHold.description: Indicator if inventory is currently on hold

OnHoldReason.description: Reason for placing the inventory on hold

OnHoldDate.description: Date when the inventory was put on hold

OnHoldUserIdentifier.description: Identifier of the user who placed the inventory on hold

Quarantined.description: Indicator if inventory is currently quarantined

RowVersion.description: Version number of the inventory item

StockRowVersion.description: Version number of the stock related to the inventory item

ReferenceNum.description: Reference number associated with the inventory item

PoNum.description: Purchase order number associated with the inventory

TrailerNumber.description: Number of the trailer used for transporting the inventory
